Detailed Description

inverse cross section with barrier distributions

!

calculates transmission coefficientinverse cross sections using a simplistic barrier distribution logic. The final result is the average of three inverse cross sections. where is the standard coeff derived using the IWBC and global optical-model potential. The other two are for when the radius of the nuclear potential is shifted by . where .
